My Work

Check out some of my projects...

Who's That Pokémon is a project inspired by the popular question-and-answer segment that is featured in numerous episodes of the Pokémon anime. I developed this game for a project assignment at General Assembly's Web Development Immersive (WDI) Course.

There are three different difficulty settings and two different game modes in this game. The easiest setting is Greyscale which shows Pokémons in the OG Game Boy non colored version. Shadow is the normal version of showing just the silhouette of the Pokémon and the user would have to input the name. Extreme involves having to input both the Pokémon's name and type. For Pokémons with multiple types, only one type would be required to be inputted.

Feel free to try out the game and if you are interested in knowing more about how I made it please click below to see my Github repo!
